summary: Skyrim_Faces are face (Normal maps) mod which changes how Skyrim denizens - game races look.
descriptionHtml:
---README---

for DALLs - Skyrim_Faces

v1.1

23/12/2011

Skyrim_Faces are face mod which changes how Skyrim denizens - game races look.*

* Word of warning - my \"cosmetic\" mods - regardless of being adult or not - are made to provide for natural / life-like good looks - so they might not be right for you - if you are seeking some wild / day-dream fantasy!

As Creation Kit - aka mod toolset - is, still not with us, there is not much that can be - really - done to improve or remake Skyrim faces for good but luckily, there are few useful n valid methods which can (in-meantime) help - better Normal Maps in this case.

If you are familiar with game textures, you\'ll know what normal maps do n stand for - but if you are not - think of them (in this particular case) as of facial bone-structure - under skin (3d) lumps n bumps. Technically, they are de-facto (micro) extension of main head/body model meshes / models and as such, they are very important face forming element. In practice, they can be considered as main gender and character / race former / face recognition maker. Facial normal maps supplied with game are small (in size) n quite crudely made so all in game characters suffer and look as badly as they do. And that is present n main objective of this mod - full (HD) set of new n improved (facial) normal maps for all (in-game) races n genders - short of cat-folk (Khajit). 

My aim with them (my facial normal maps) was to preserve race / gender diversity so don\'t expect only one \"pretty face\" on them all. Races are on purpose made to be somewhat different - better n prettier ;) - then Bethesda\'s game offer but along same (traditional lore-races) guide-lines. This files / my mod will work fine with other facial / skin (re-texture) mods but most importantly, they will definitely improve characters in your vanilla game. If you want, good body n face textures (visible / surface skin) as well check my Skyrim_Nords mod or find some other you like better. Only remember - to install this one - last!
 
To install you need to navigate to your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim - game folder and paste / drag n drop in it my Data (mod) folder. Allow overwrite!    

If you don\'t like this new look, simply delete / remove my male/femalehead_msn texture files from Data/textures/actors/character/ (all except Khajit) and original look will be restored to your game.

Bugs/conflicts: none known - but if you like them - take care not to overwrite them by accident!

Not on v1.1: Some slight (aesthetics spotting) improvements of human male n female, imperial female and redguard female - otherwise same as v1.0
  
Use:
Free to use but if used for modding ask me for permission!

Enjoy and try to remember - if you like it even in a part - to give endorsement! 

Thanks to Bethesda for great game.
author: Dall
